column1: Kata Robata////Not bad... definitely good sushi for its price. The miso soup
column2: agedashidofu and all thing with liquid came out lukewarm.  I had to send them all back
column3: and they came out heated when they brought them back out. Taste is great
column4: but why are they lukewarm?  Slightly annoying and I had the waiter point it out to the person in the suit that looked like the manager
column5: but he never came over to the table or acknowledge us in anyway. That's fine since they did warm it up
